game.name: Ice Cream Puff Sara
game.description:
The summer season is on its way and you are just ready to learn something delicious dessert to surprise your family and friends. Come out from your comfort zone and see what techniques and tricks the world-popular chef is using to whip out a highly scrumptious dessert â€“ Ice Cream Puff. In this exclusively-designed free online cooking game for girls, Sara Cooking Class will never let you down if you are seriously seeking for the ways on how to make your very own ice cream puffs in the least possible time.  

You can serve this fluffy and light dessert in front of your guests and friends as a tasty snack. Just follow the simple and easy Sara instructions to prepare this yummy treat in this cool cooking game. You have to complete the task within the limited time frame, so focus on how to cook this dish quickly. This will help you to get the maximum possible score in this fun cooking game for kids.  

You can start this game by just preparing the mouth-watering golden pastries and then bring them to use in preparing the sandwich tangy strawberry ice cream. Pour the chocolate sauce as much as you like in order to complete the last step of this cool game for children of all ages. Make sure that you have collected all the ingredients like eggs, flour, salt, sugar, butter, water and some strawberry ice cream to prepare the delicious ice cream puffs. So, what are you waiting for? Play this free online game and try this scrumptious dessert today at your home to give yours and friends taste buds an unforgettable treat!
